availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert L. Thompson (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Lindsey Thompson in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1831. Father of Nancy Thompson, Susan Thompson, Louisa Thompson, Julia Thompson, Martha Thompson, William Thompson, Lydia Thompson, Theodore Thompson, and John Thompson. Farmer in Harrison County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 68B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 622.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 126A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film #000216883.
